content: I don't like the current setup of the folder Mathlib.Algebra.Hom that holds definitions of morphism types for all kinds of algebraic structures. I believe the file defining a type of morphisms belongs alongside the file defining the structure this morphism works on. So I would like to reorganize these files so that e.g. Mathlib.Algebra.Hom.Ring becomes Mathlib.Algebra.Ring.Hom and Mathlib.Algebra.Hom.NonUnitalAlg becomes Mathlib.Algebra.Algebra.NonUnitalHom. Before I do so, any objections?
Hmm, in fact I did the reverse refactor a while ago. Not claiming it was a good idea, just letting you know.
